title: Harmanpreet Kaur's Heroics Power Mumbai Indians to WPL Playoffs: A Thrilling Chase
content:
Harmanpreet Kaur delivered a breathtaking performance, smashing an unbeaten 95 off 48 balls, to guide the Mumbai Indians to a thrilling seven-wicket win over the Gujarat Giants in the Women's Premier League.  

The Giants, led by half-centuries from Dayalan Hemalatha and Beth Mooney, set a challenging target of 190/7.  But Kaur's explosive batting, coupled with Yastika Bhatia's fifty, turned the tide. 

This victory secured Mumbai's spot in the playoffs, while the Giants' hopes of advancing dwindled. Kaur's match-winning knock showcased her exceptional hitting power and cemented her status as a true legend of women's cricket.
author: Scroll Staff
